name: Maru
description:
Overview

Maru is an adventure game full of action and puzzles. It has minimalistic graphics, smooth mechanics and two controllable main characters. It depends on a sad and surrealistic story told in one act. Original and challenging puzzles placed in the flow of the story await you.

Story

Maru, who mysteriously lost his father, finds himself in an interesting adventure with his best friend Lei. While trying to make sense of what happened in this adventure, he also learns that there is an interesting way of restoring all this and reviving his father. To this end, he tries to overcome difficult conditions and enemies whose origin is not known until he reaches his target. Maru and Lei fight together until the end of this journey.

Features

  • Fluent Mechanics
  • Different Characters
  • Challenging and Original Puzzles
  • Atmospheric Scenes
  • Drama
